Title: Child's Play
Writer: Tyler Burton Smith (screenplay by), Don Mancini (based on "Child's Play" screenplay by), John Lafia (based on "Child's Play" screenplay by), Tom Holland (based on "Child's Play" screenplay by), Don Mancini (based on "Child's Play" story by)
Actors: Tim Matheson, Ben Daon, Zahra Anderson, Serge Jaswal
Plot: A mother gives her 13-year-old son a toy doll for his birthday, unaware of its more sinister nature.
